fullText: This brilliant biomusical brings the Afrobeat pioneer to rousing life with infectious music, spectacular dancing and a magnetic lead performance by Sahr Ngaujah.
dtliExcerpt: This brilliant biomusical brings the Afrobeat pioneer to rousing life with infectious music, spectacular dancing and a magnetic lead performance by Sahr Ngaujah.
